title: Master Scorecard Tool
content: Visualize sales, profit, and logistics KPIs on a single page. The perfect tool for every Monday meeting.

title: Commercial Business Plan Review
content: At the end of each quarter, let's review the Business Plan. Different areas, different action plans, but all with the same analytical spirit.

title: Analyzer Tool
content: A dynamic dashboard that guides us from the general to the particular, in each commercial decision.

title: Scorecard by Area or Category or product
content: Each unit as an element of strategy, let's analyze our KPIs defined by Analytical Engineering.

title: SQL Queries
content: To ensure that the data is useful for analysis, i use analytics engineering in all SQL queries.

title: System Integrations
content: I connect different systems to work together smoothly.

title: Cloud Migration
content: I move your systems to the cloud efficiently.
